title: Online Intensive Education Course in Restorative Dentistry

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Blended process combining real-time video lectures and asynchronous learning conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Understand and apply the latest clinical techniques in restorative dentistry to practical cases
Explain key elements to consider when developing a comprehensive restorative treatment plan
Describe step-by-step the restorative design process using digital dentistry technologies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
